title: [Slave Pen]
description: Low-ceilinged and shallow, this room is lighted only by the modest rays of moonlight permitted by the small porthole.  Iron manacles, flecked with rust and what might be dried blood, are attached to a bolt on the inner bulkhead.

Low-ceilinged and shallow, this room is lighted only by the modest rays of sunshine permitted by the small porthole.  Iron manacles, flecked with rust and what might be dried blood, are attached to a bolt on the inner bulkhead.
